00020     template <class NodeType, class BTreeType>
00021     class node_cache;
00022 
00023     template <class KeyType_, class KeyCmp_, unsigned RawSize_, class BTreeType>
00024     class normal_node
00025     {
00026     public:
00027         typedef normal_node<KeyType_, KeyCmp_, RawSize_, BTreeType> SelfType;
00028 
00029         friend class node_cache<SelfType, BTreeType>;
00030 
00031         typedef KeyType_ key_type;
00032         typedef KeyCmp_ key_compare;
00033 
00034         enum {
00035             raw_size = RawSize_
00036         };
00037         typedef BID<raw_size> bid_type;
00038         typedef bid_type node_bid_type;
00039         typedef SelfType node_type;
00040         typedef std::pair<key_type, bid_type>  value_type;
00041         typedef value_type & reference;
00042         typedef const value_type & const_reference;
00043 
00044 
00045         struct InfoType
00046         {
00047             bid_type me;
00048             unsigned cur_size;
00049         };
00050         typedef typed_block < raw_size, value_type, 0, InfoType > block_type;
00051 
00052         enum {
00053             nelements = block_type::size - 1,
00054             max_size = nelements,
00055             min_size = nelements / 2
00056         };
00057         typedef typename block_type::iterator block_iterator;
00058         typedef typename block_type::const_iterator block_const_iterator;
00059 
00060         typedef BTreeType btree_type;
00061         typedef typename btree_type::size_type size_type;
00062         typedef typename btree_type::iterator iterator;
00063         typedef typename btree_type::const_iterator const_iterator;
00064 
00065         typedef typename btree_type::value_type btree_value_type;
00066         typedef typename btree_type::leaf_bid_type leaf_bid_type;
00067         typedef typename btree_type::leaf_type leaf_type;
00068 
00069         typedef node_cache<normal_node, btree_type> node_cache_type;
00070 
00071 
00072     private:
00073         normal_node();
00074         normal_node(const normal_node &);
00075         normal_node & operator = (const normal_node &);
00076 
00077         struct value_compare : public std::binary_function<value_type, bid_type, bool>
00078         {
00079             key_compare comp;
00080 
00081             value_compare(key_compare c) : comp(c) { }
00082 
00083             bool operator() (const value_type & x, const value_type & y) const
00084             {
00085                 return comp(x.first, y.first);
00086             }
00087         };
00088 
00089         block_type * block_;
00090         btree_type * btree_;
00091         key_compare cmp_;
00092         value_compare vcmp_;
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096         template <class BIDType>
00097         std::pair<key_type, bid_type> insert(const std::pair<key_type, BIDType> &splitter,
00098                                              const block_iterator & place2insert)
00099         {
00100             std::pair<key_type, bid_type> result(key_compare::max_value(), bid_type());
00101 
00102             // splitter != *place2insert
00103             assert(vcmp_(*place2insert, splitter) || vcmp_(splitter, *place2insert));
00104 
00105             block_iterator cur = block_->begin() + size() - 1;
00106             for ( ; cur >= place2insert; --cur)
00107                 *(cur + 1) = *cur;
00108             // copy elements to make space for the new element
00109 
00110             *place2insert = splitter;                     // insert
00111 
00112             ++ (block_->info.cur_size);
00113 
00114             if (size() > max_nelements())                    // overflow! need to split
00115             {
00116                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node::insert overflow happened, splitting");
00117 
00118                 bid_type NewBid;
00119                 btree_->node_cache_.get_new_node(NewBid);                         // new (left) node
00120                 normal_node * NewNode = btree_->node_cache_.get_node(NewBid, true);
00121                 assert(NewNode);
00122 
00123                 const unsigned end_of_smaller_part = size() / 2;
00124 
00125                 result.first = ((*block_)[end_of_smaller_part - 1]).first;
00126                 result.second = NewBid;
00127 
00128 
00129                 const unsigned old_size = size();
00130                 // copy the smaller part
00131                 std::copy(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + end_of_smaller_part, NewNode->block_->begin());
00132                 NewNode->block_->info.cur_size = end_of_smaller_part;
00133                 // copy the larger part
00134                 std::copy(      block_->begin() + end_of_smaller_part,
00135                                 block_->begin() + old_size, block_->begin());
00136                 block_->info.cur_size = old_size - end_of_smaller_part;
00137                 assert(size() + NewNode->size() == old_size);
00138 
00139                 btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node(NewBid);
00140 
00141                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node split leaf " << this
00142                                                                 << " splitter: " << result.first);
00143             }
00144 
00145             return result;
00146         }
00147 
00148         template <class CacheType>
00149         void fuse_or_balance(block_iterator UIt, CacheType & cache_)
00150         {
00151             typedef typename CacheType::node_type local_node_type;
00152             typedef typename local_node_type::bid_type local_bid_type;
00153 
00154             block_iterator leftIt, rightIt;
00155             if (UIt == (block_->begin() + size() - 1) )                  // UIt is the last entry in the root
00156             {
00157                 assert(UIt != block_->begin());
00158                 rightIt = UIt;
00159                 leftIt = --UIt;
00160             }
00161             else
00162             {
00163                 leftIt = UIt;
00164                 rightIt = ++UIt;
00165                 assert(rightIt != (block_->begin() + size()));
00166             }
00167 
00168             // now fuse or balance nodes pointed by leftIt and rightIt
00169             local_bid_type LeftBid = (local_bid_type) leftIt->second;
00170             local_bid_type RightBid = (local_bid_type) rightIt->second;
00171             local_node_type * LeftNode = cache_.get_node(LeftBid, true);
00172             local_node_type * RightNode = cache_.get_node(RightBid, true);
00173 
00174             const unsigned TotalSize = LeftNode->size() + RightNode->size();
00175             if (TotalSize <= RightNode->max_nelements())
00176             {
00177                 // fuse
00178                 RightNode->fuse(*LeftNode);                         // add the content of LeftNode to RightNode
00179 
00180                 cache_.unfix_node(RightBid);
00181                 cache_.delete_node(LeftBid);                         // 'delete_node' unfixes LeftBid also
00182 
00183                 std::copy(leftIt + 1, block_->begin() + size(), leftIt );                        // delete left BID from the root
00184                 -- (block_->info.cur_size);
00185             }
00186             else
00187             {
00188                 // balance
00189 
00190                 key_type NewSplitter = RightNode->balance(*LeftNode);
00191 
00192 
00193                 leftIt->first = NewSplitter;                         // change key
00194                 assert(vcmp_(*leftIt, *rightIt));
00195 
00196                 cache_.unfix_node(LeftBid);
00197                 cache_.unfix_node(RightBid);
00198             }
00199         }
00200 
00201     public:
00202         virtual ~normal_node()
00203         {
00204             delete block_;
00205         }
00206 
00207         normal_node(    btree_type * btree__,
00208                         key_compare cmp) :
00209             block_(new block_type),
00210             btree_(btree__),
00211             cmp_(cmp),
00212             vcmp_(cmp)
00213         {
00214             assert(min_nelements() >= 2);
00215             assert(2 * min_nelements() - 1 <= max_nelements());
00216             assert(max_nelements() <= nelements);
00217             assert(unsigned (block_type::size) >= nelements + 1);                   // extra space for an overflow
00218         }
00219 
00220         block_type & block()
00221         {
00222             return *block_;
00223         }
00224 
00225         bool overflows () const { return block_->info.cur_size > max_nelements(); }
00226         bool underflows () const { return block_->info.cur_size < min_nelements(); }
00227 
00228         unsigned max_nelements() const { return max_size; }
00229         unsigned min_nelements() const { return min_size; }
00230 
00231         /*
00232            template <class InputIterator>
00233            normal_node(InputIterator begin_, InputIterator end_,
00234                 btree_type * btree__,
00235                 key_compare cmp):
00236                 block_(new block_type),
00237                 btree_(btree__),
00238                 cmp_(cmp),
00239                 vcmp_(cmp)
00240            {
00241                 assert(min_nelements() >=2);
00242                 assert(2*min_nelements() - 1 <= max_nelements());
00243                 assert(max_nelements() <= nelements);
00244                 assert(unsigned(block_type::size) >= nelements +1); // extra space for an overflow
00245 
00246                 unsigned new_size = end_ - begin_;
00247                 assert(new_size <= max_nelements());
00248                 assert(new_size >= min_nelements());
00249 
00250                 std::copy(begin_,end_,block_->begin());
00251                 assert(stxxl::is_sorted(block_->begin(),block_->begin() + new_size, vcmp_));
00252                 block_->info.cur_size = new_size;
00253            }*/
00254 
00255         unsigned size() const
00256         {
00257             return block_->info.cur_size;
00258         }
00259 
00260         bid_type my_bid() const
00261         {
00262             return block_->info.me;
00263         }
00264 
00265         void save()
00266         {
00267             request_ptr req = block_->write(my_bid());
00268             req->wait();
00269         }
00270 
00271         request_ptr load(const bid_type & bid)
00272         {
00273             request_ptr req = block_->read(bid);
00274             req->wait();
00275             assert(bid == my_bid());
00276             return req;
00277         }
00278 
00279         request_ptr prefetch(const bid_type & bid)
00280         {
00281             return block_->read(bid);
00282         }
00283 
00284         void init(const bid_type & my_bid_)
00285         {
00286             block_->info.me = my_bid_;
00287             block_->info.cur_size = 0;
00288         }

00290         reference operator [] (int i)
00291         {
00292             return (*block_)[i];
00293         }
00294 
00295         const_reference operator [] (int i) const
00296         {
00297             return (*block_)[i];
00298         }
00299 
00300         reference back()
00301         {
00302             return (*block_)[size() - 1];
00303         }
00304 
00305         reference front()
00306         {
00307             return *(block_->begin());
00308         }
00309 
00310         const_reference back() const
00311         {
00312             return (*block_)[size() - 1];
00313         }
00314 
00315         const_reference front() const
00316         {
00317             return *(block_->begin());
00318         }

00321         std::pair<iterator, bool> insert(
00322             const btree_value_type & x,
00323             unsigned height,
00324             std::pair<key_type, bid_type> &splitter)
00325         {
00326             assert(size() <= max_nelements());
00327             splitter.first = key_compare::max_value();
00328 
00329             value_type Key2Search(x.first, bid_type());
00330             block_iterator it =
00331                 std::lower_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00332 
00333             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00334 
00335             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00336 
00337             if (height == 2)                    // found_bid points to a leaf
00338             {
00339                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Inserting new value into a leaf");
00340                 leaf_type * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_node((leaf_bid_type)it->second, true);
00341                 assert(Leaf);
00342                 std::pair<key_type, leaf_bid_type> BotSplitter;
00343                 std::pair<iterator, bool> result = Leaf->insert(x, BotSplitter);
00344                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)it->second);
00345                 //if(key_compare::max_value() == BotSplitter.first)
00346                 if (!(cmp_(key_compare::max_value(), BotSplitter.first) ||
00347                       cmp_(BotSplitter.first, key_compare::max_value()) ))
00348                     return result;
00349                 // no overflow/splitting happened
00350 
00351                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Inserting new value in *this");
00352 
00353                 splitter = insert(BotSplitter, it);
00354 
00355                 return result;
00356             }
00357             else
00358             {                           // found_bid points to a node
00359                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Inserting new value into a node");
00360                 node_type * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_node((node_bid_type)it->second, true);
00361                 assert(Node);
00362                 std::pair<key_type, node_bid_type> BotSplitter;
00363                 std::pair<iterator, bool> result = Node->insert(x, height - 1, BotSplitter);
00364                 btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)it->second);
00365                 //if(key_compare::max_value() == BotSplitter.first)
00366                 if (!(cmp_(key_compare::max_value(), BotSplitter.first) ||
00367                       cmp_(BotSplitter.first, key_compare::max_value()) ))
00368                     return result;
00369                 // no overflow/splitting happened
00370 
00371                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Inserting new value in *this");
00372 
00373                 splitter = insert(BotSplitter, it);
00374 
00375                 return result;
00376             }
00377         }
00378 
00379         iterator begin(unsigned height)
00380         {
00381             bid_type FirstBid = block_->begin()->second;
00382             if (height == 2)                    // FirstBid points to a leaf
00383             {
00384                 assert(size() > 1);
00385                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node retrieveing begin() from the first leaf");
00386                 leaf_type * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_node((leaf_bid_type)FirstBid);
00387                 assert(Leaf);
00388                 return Leaf->begin();
00389             }
00390             else
00391             {                     // FirstBid points to a node
00392                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree: retrieveing begin() from the first node");
00393                 node_type * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_node((node_bid_type)FirstBid, true);
00394                 assert(Node);
00395                 iterator result = Node->begin(height - 1);
00396                 btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)FirstBid);
00397                 return result;
00398             }
00399         }
00400 
00401         const_iterator begin(unsigned height) const
00402         {
00403             bid_type FirstBid = block_->begin()->second;
00404             if (height == 2)                    // FirstBid points to a leaf
00405             {
00406                 assert(size() > 1);
00407                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::node retrieveing begin() from the first leaf");
00408                 leaf_type const * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_const_node((leaf_bid_type)FirstBid);
00409                 assert(Leaf);
00410                 return Leaf->begin();
00411             }
00412             else
00413             {                     // FirstBid points to a node
00414                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree: retrieveing begin() from the first node");
00415                 node_type const * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_const_node((node_bid_type)FirstBid, true);
00416                 assert(Node);
00417                 const_iterator result = Node->begin(height - 1);
00418                 btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)FirstBid);
00419                 return result;
00420             }
00421         }
00422 
00423         iterator find(const key_type & k, unsigned height)
00424         {
00425             value_type Key2Search(k, bid_type());
00426 
00427             block_iterator it =
00428                 std::lower_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00429 
00430             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00431 
00432             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00433 
00434             if (height == 2)            // found_bid points to a leaf
00435             {
00436                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching in a leaf");
00437                 leaf_type * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00438                 assert(Leaf);
00439                 iterator result = Leaf->find(k);
00440                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid);
00441 
00442                 return result;
00443             }
00444 
00445             // found_bid points to a node
00446             STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching in a node");
00447             node_type * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_node((node_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00448             assert(Node);
00449             iterator result = Node->find(k, height - 1);
00450             btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)found_bid);
00451 
00452             return result;
00453         }
00454 
00455         const_iterator find(const key_type & k, unsigned height) const
00456         {
00457             value_type Key2Search(k, bid_type());
00458 
00459             block_iterator it =
00460                 std::lower_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00461 
00462             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00463 
00464             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00465 
00466             if (height == 2)            // found_bid points to a leaf
00467             {
00468                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching in a leaf");
00469                 leaf_type const * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_const_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00470                 assert(Leaf);
00471                 const_iterator result = Leaf->find(k);
00472                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid);
00473 
00474                 return result;
00475             }
00476 
00477             // found_bid points to a node
00478             STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching in a node");
00479             node_type const * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_const_node((node_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00480             assert(Node);
00481             const_iterator result = Node->find(k, height - 1);
00482             btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)found_bid);
00483 
00484             return result;
00485         }

00487         iterator lower_bound(const key_type & k, unsigned height)
00488         {
00489             value_type Key2Search(k, bid_type());
00490             assert(!vcmp_(back(), Key2Search));
00491             block_iterator it =
00492                 std::lower_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00493 
00494             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00495 
00496             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00497 
00498             if (height == 2)            // found_bid points to a leaf
00499             {
00500                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching lower bound in a leaf");
00501                 leaf_type * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00502                 assert(Leaf);
00503                 iterator result = Leaf->lower_bound(k);
00504                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid);
00505 
00506                 return result;
00507             }
00508 
00509             // found_bid points to a node
00510             STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching lower bound in a node");
00511             node_type * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_node((node_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00512             assert(Node);
00513             iterator result = Node->lower_bound(k, height - 1);
00514             btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)found_bid);
00515 
00516             return result;
00517         }
00518 
00519         const_iterator lower_bound(const key_type & k, unsigned height) const
00520         {
00521             value_type Key2Search(k, bid_type());
00522             assert(!vcmp_(back(), Key2Search));
00523             block_iterator it =
00524                 std::lower_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00525 
00526             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00527 
00528             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00529 
00530             if (height == 2)            // found_bid points to a leaf
00531             {
00532                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching lower bound in a leaf");
00533                 leaf_type const * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_const_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00534                 assert(Leaf);
00535                 const_iterator result = Leaf->lower_bound(k);
00536                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid);
00537 
00538                 return result;
00539             }
00540 
00541             // found_bid points to a node
00542             STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching lower bound in a node");
00543             node_type const * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_const_node((node_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00544             assert(Node);
00545             const_iterator result = Node->lower_bound(k, height - 1);
00546             btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)found_bid);
00547 
00548             return result;
00549         }

00551         iterator upper_bound(const key_type & k, unsigned height)
00552         {
00553             value_type Key2Search(k, bid_type());
00554             assert(vcmp_(Key2Search, back()));
00555             block_iterator it =
00556                 std::upper_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00557 
00558             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00559 
00560             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00561 
00562             if (height == 2)            // found_bid points to a leaf
00563             {
00564                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching upper bound in a leaf");
00565                 leaf_type * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00566                 assert(Leaf);
00567                 iterator result = Leaf->upper_bound(k);
00568                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid);
00569 
00570                 return result;
00571             }
00572 
00573             // found_bid points to a node
00574             STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching upper bound in a node");
00575             node_type * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_node((node_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00576             assert(Node);
00577             iterator result = Node->upper_bound(k, height - 1);
00578             btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)found_bid);
00579 
00580             return result;
00581         }

00583         const_iterator upper_bound(const key_type & k, unsigned height) const
00584         {
00585             value_type Key2Search(k, bid_type());
00586             assert(vcmp_(Key2Search, back()));
00587             block_iterator it =
00588                 std::upper_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00589 
00590             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00591 
00592             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00593 
00594             if (height == 2)            // found_bid points to a leaf
00595             {
00596                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching upper bound in a leaf");
00597                 leaf_type const * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_const_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00598                 assert(Leaf);
00599                 const_iterator result = Leaf->upper_bound(k);
00600                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid);
00601 
00602                 return result;
00603             }
00604 
00605             // found_bid points to a node
00606             STXXL_VERBOSE1("Searching upper bound in a node");
00607             node_type const * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_const_node((node_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00608             assert(Node);
00609             const_iterator result = Node->upper_bound(k, height - 1);
00610             btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)found_bid);
00611 
00612             return result;
00613         }
00614 
00615         void fuse(const normal_node & Src)
00616         {
00617             assert(vcmp_(Src.back(), front()));
00618             const unsigned SrcSize = Src.size();
00619 
00620             block_iterator cur = block_->begin() + size() - 1;
00621             block_const_iterator begin = block_->begin();
00622 
00623             for ( ; cur >= begin; --cur)
00624                 *(cur + SrcSize) = *cur;
00625             // move elements to make space for Src elements
00626 
00627             // copy Src to *this leaf
00628             std::copy(Src.block_->begin(), Src.block_->begin() + SrcSize, block_->begin());
00629 
00630             block_->info.cur_size += SrcSize;
00631         }
00632 
00633 
00634         key_type balance(normal_node & Left)
00635         {
00636             const unsigned TotalSize = Left.size() + size();
00637             unsigned newLeftSize = TotalSize / 2;
00638             assert(newLeftSize <= Left.max_nelements());
00639             assert(newLeftSize >= Left.min_nelements());
00640             unsigned newRightSize = TotalSize - newLeftSize;
00641             assert(newRightSize <= max_nelements());
00642             assert(newRightSize >= min_nelements());
00643 
00644             assert(vcmp_(Left.back(), front()) || size() == 0);
00645 
00646             if (newLeftSize < Left.size())
00647             {
00648                 const unsigned nEl2Move = Left.size() - newLeftSize;                        // #elements to move from Left to *this
00649 
00650                 block_iterator cur = block_->begin() + size() - 1;
00651                 block_const_iterator begin = block_->begin();
00652 
00653                 for ( ; cur >= begin; --cur)
00654                     *(cur + nEl2Move) = *cur;
00655                 // move elements to make space for Src elements
00656 
00657                 // copy Left to *this leaf
00658                 std::copy(      Left.block_->begin() + newLeftSize,
00659                                 Left.block_->begin() + Left.size(), block_->begin());
00660             }
00661             else
00662             {
00663                 assert(newRightSize < size());
00664 
00665                 const unsigned nEl2Move = size() - newRightSize;                        // #elements to move from *this to Left
00666 
00667                 // copy *this to Left
00668                 std::copy(      block_->begin(),
00669                                 block_->begin() + nEl2Move, Left.block_->begin() + Left.size());
00670                 // move elements in *this
00671                 std::copy(      block_->begin() + nEl2Move,
00672                                 block_->begin() + size(), block_->begin() );
00673             }
00674 
00675             block_->info.cur_size = newRightSize;                     // update size
00676             Left.block_->info.cur_size = newLeftSize;                     // update size
00677 
00678             return Left.back().first;
00679         }
00680 
00681         size_type erase(const key_type & k, unsigned height)
00682         {
00683             value_type Key2Search(k, bid_type());
00684 
00685             block_iterator it =
00686                 std::lower_bound(block_->begin(), block_->begin() + size(), Key2Search, vcmp_);
00687 
00688             assert(it != (block_->begin() + size()));
00689 
00690             bid_type found_bid = it->second;
00691 
00692             assert(size() >= 2);
00693 
00694             if (height == 2)                    // 'found_bid' points to a leaf
00695             {
00696                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Deleting key from a leaf");
00697                 leaf_type * Leaf = btree_->leaf_cache_.get_node((leaf_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00698                 assert(Leaf);
00699                 size_type result = Leaf->erase(k);
00700                 btree_->leaf_cache_.unfix_node((leaf_bid_type)it->second);
00701                 if (!Leaf->underflows())
00702                     return result;
00703                 // no underflow or root has a special degree 1 (too few elements)
00704 
00705                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Fusing or rebalancing a leaf");
00706                 fuse_or_balance(it, btree_->leaf_cache_);
00707 
00708                 return result;
00709             }
00710 
00711             // 'found_bid' points to a node
00712             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Deleting key from a node");
00713             node_type * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_node((node_bid_type)found_bid, true);
00714             assert(Node);
00715             size_type result = Node->erase(k, height - 1);
00716             btree_->node_cache_.unfix_node((node_bid_type)found_bid);
00717             if (!Node->underflows())
00718                 return result;
00719             // no underflow happened
00720 
00721             STXXL_VERBOSE1("btree::normal_node Fusing or rebalancing a node");
00722             fuse_or_balance(it, btree_->node_cache_);
00723 
00724             return result;
00725         }
00726 
00727         void deallocate_children(unsigned height)
00728         {
00729             if (height == 2)
00730             {
00731                 // we have children leaves here
00732                 block_const_iterator it = block().begin();
00733                 for ( ; it != block().begin() + size(); ++it)
00734                 {
00735                     // delete from leaf cache and deallocate bid
00736                     btree_->leaf_cache_.delete_node((leaf_bid_type)it->second);
00737                 }
00738             }
00739             else
00740             {
00741                 block_const_iterator it = block().begin();
00742                 for ( ; it != block().begin() + size(); ++it)
00743                 {
00744                     node_type * Node = btree_->node_cache_.get_node((node_bid_type)it->second);
00745                     assert(Node);
00746                     Node->deallocate_children(height - 1);
00747                     // delete from node cache and deallocate bid
00748                     btree_->node_cache_.delete_node((node_bid_type)it->second);
00749                 }
00750             }
00751         }
00752 
00753         void push_back(const value_type & x)
00754         {
00755             (*this)[size()] = x;
00756             ++ (block_->info.cur_size);
00757         }
00758     };
00759 }
00760
